name: Cargills Rice Blend
description: Traditional Rice Blend contains a diverse blend of suwandel, kalu heeneti, ma wee hangimuttan, kuruluthuda and pachchaperumal rice varieties. The quintessential superfood containing numerous medicial and nutritional properties of all the constituent varieties. This rice variety is ideal (even in porridge form) for anyone who pursues a holistically healthy lifestyle.   *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
